entries: The orc moves up to its walking speed without provoking {@action opportunity attack|PHB|opportunity attacks} and targets each creature within 5 feet of it during its movement. Each target must succeed on a {@dc 15} Dexterity saving throw or take 17 ({@damage 2d12 + 4}) slashing damage.

bonus.name: Aggressive
entries: The orc can move up to its speed toward a hostile creature that it can see.

legendary.name: Charge
entries: The orc moves up to its speed.

legendary.name: Intimidate Foe
entries: The orc targets one creature it can see within 30 feet of it. If the target can see and hear the orc, it must make a {@dc 13} Wisdom saving throw or become {@condition frightened} of the orc until the end of the orc's next turn.

legendary.name: Attack (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: The orc makes a melee or ranged attack.

legendary.name: Maim (Costs 3 Actions)
entries: The orc attacks with its greataxe. If the attack hits, the target takes an extra 6 ({@damage 1d12}) slashing damage and the target must make a {@dc 15} Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, the target has disadvantage on attack rolls and ability checks, and can't take reactions. The target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. A target that regains all of its hit points also ends the effect.

trait.name: Reckless
entries: At the start of its turn, the orc can gain advantage on all melee weapon attack rolls during that turn, but attack rolls against it have advantage until the start of its next turn.

trait.name: Unarmored Defense
entries: While the orc is wearing no armor, its AC includes its Constitution modifier.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The orc makes three melee attacks: two with its Battleaxe attacks and one with its Handaxe.

action.name: Battleaxe
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) slashing damage or 9 ({@damage 1d8 + 5}) slashing damage while raging, 8 ({@damage 1d10 + 3}) slashing damage if used with two hands or 10 ({@damage 1d10 + 5}) slashing damage if used with two hands while raging.

action.name: Handaxe
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) slashing damage or 8 ({@damage 1d6 + 5}) slashing damage while raging.

action.name: Javelin
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 30/120 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) piercing damage, or 8 ({@damage 1d6 + 5}) piercing damage while raging.

action.name: Blood for Blood
entries: While raging, when the orc deals melee weapon damage to an enemy creature, the orc can take a bonus action to gain 10 temporary hit points.

bonus.name: Aggressive
entries: The orc can move up to its speed toward a hostile creature that it can see.

bonus.name: Rage (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
entries: The orc enters a rage. The rage lasts for 1 minute or until the orc is {@condition incapacitated}. While raging, the orc gains the following benefits:

items: The orc has advantage on Strength checks and Strength saving throws
When it makes a melee weapon attack, the orc gains a {@hit 2} bonus to the damage roll (included in the attack.
The orc has resistance to bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing damage.

reaction.name: Retaliation
entries: When the orc takes damage from a creature within 5 feet of it, the orc can make one melee weapon attack against the creature.

trait.name: Uncanny Senses
entries: The opinicus can't be surprised while it isn't {@condition incapacitated}.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The opinicus makes two Claw attacks.

action.name: Claw
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) slashing damage plus 7 ({@damage 2d6}) radiant damage.

action.name: Etherealness
entries: The opinicus magically enters the Ethereal Plane from the Material Plane, or vice versa.

action.name: Radiant Gaze {@recharge 5}
entries: The opinicus's eyes burn intensely like the sun, emitting radiant energy in a 30-foot cone. Each fiend, ooze, and undead in that area must make a {@dc 16} Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, a creature takes 40 ({@damage 9d8}) radiant damage and is {@condition blinded} until the end of its next turn. On a successful save, a creature takes half as much damage and isn't {@condition blinded}. Creatures with sunlight sensitivity must also make their saving throws but only against being {@condition blinded}.

action.name: Turn Undead (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
entries: Each undead creature within 30 feet of the opinicus and can see and hear the opinicus must make a {@dc 16} Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, the undead creature is {@condition frightened} for 1 minute or until it takes any damage. Undead creatures of CR 3 or less are destroyed.

A {@condition frightened} undead creature must spend its turns trying to move as far away from the opinicus as it can, and it can't willingly move to a space within 30 feet of it. The {@condition frightened} undead creature also can't take reactions. For its action, it can use only the {@action Dash} action or try to escape from an effect that prevents it from moving. If there's nowhere to move, the creature can use the {@action Dodge} action.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: The opinicus casts one of the following spells using Wisdom as the spellcasting ability (spell save {@dc 16}, {@hit 8} to hit with spell attacks):

trait.name: Uncanny Senses
entries: The opinicus can't be surprised while it isn't {@condition incapacitated}.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The opinicus makes two Claw attacks.

action.name: Claw
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) slashing damage.

action.name: Etherealness
entries: The opinicus magically enters the Ethereal Plane from the Material Plane, or vice versa.

action.name: Radiant Gaze {@recharge 5}
entries: The opinicus's eyes burn intensely like the sun, emitting radiant energy in a 30-foot cone. Each fiend, ooze, and undead in that area must make a {@dc 14} Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, a creature takes 27 ({@damage 6d8}) radiant damage and is {@condition blinded} until the end of its next turn. On a successful save, a creature takes half as much damage and isn't {@condition blinded}. Creatures with sunlight sensitivity must also make their saving throws but only against being {@condition blinded}.

action.name: Turn Undead (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
entries: Each undead creature within 30 feet of the opinicus and can see and hear the opinicus must make a {@dc 14} Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, the undead creature is {@condition frightened} for 1 minute or until it takes any damage. Undead creatures of CR 1/2 or less are destroyed.

A {@condition frightened} undead creature must spend its turns trying to move as far away from the opinicus as it can, and it can't willingly move to a space within 30 feet of it. The {@condition frightened} undead creature also can't take reactions. For its action, it can use only the {@action Dash} action or try to escape from an effect that prevents it from moving. If there's nowhere to move, the creature can use the {@action Dodge} action.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: The opinicus casts one of the following spells using Wisdom as the spellcasting ability (spell save {@dc 14}, {@hit 6} to hit with spell attacks):

trait.name: Amorphous
entries: The paraelemental can move through a space as narrow as 1 inch wide without squeezing.

trait.name: Corrode Metal
entries: Any nonmagical weapon made of metal that hits the paraelemental corrodes. After dealing damage, the weapon takes a permanent and cumulative -1 penalty to damage rolls. If its penalty drops to -5, the weapon is destroyed. Nonmagical ammunition made of metal that hits the ooze is destroyed after dealing damage.
The paraelemental can eat through 2-inch-thick, nonmagical metal in 1 round.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The paraelemental makes two Slam attacks.

action.name: Slam
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}11 ({@damage 2d8 + 2}) bludgeoning damage plus 7 ({@damage 2d6}) acid damage and if the target is wearing nonmagical metal armor, its armor is partly corroded and takes a permanent and cumulative -1 penalty to the AC it offers. The armor is destroyed if the penalty reduces its AC to 10.

action.name: Hurl Acid
entries: {@atk rs} {@hit 5} to hit, range 30 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d10}) acid damage and if the target is wearing nonmagical metal armor, its armor is partly corroded and takes a permanent and cumulative -1 penalty to the AC it offers. The armor is destroyed if the penalty reduces its AC to 10.

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
entries: If the dragon fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

trait.name: Stone Camouflage
entries: Smok ma przewagę w testach Zręczności ({@skill Stealth}) wykonywanych w celu ukrycia się w skalistym terenie.

trait.name: Sunlight Sensitivity
entries: Podczas przebywania w świetle słonecznym, smok ma minus na rolki ataku, jak również na kontrole Mądrości ({@skill Perception}), które polegają na wzroku.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: Smok może użyć swojej Przerażającej Obecności. Następnie wykonuje jeden atak typu Bite oraz dwa ataki typu Claw.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} +13 to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. {@h}18 ({@damage 2d10 + 7}) piercing damage plus 10 ({@damage 3d6}) psychic damage.

action.name: Claw
entries: {@atk mw} +13 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}14 ({@damage 2d6 + 7}) slashing damage.

action.name: Tail
entries: {@atk mw} +13 to hit, reach 20 ft., one target. {@h}16 ({@damage 2d8 + 7}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Frightful Presence
entries: Każda wybrana przez smoka istota, która znajduje się w promieniu 120 stóp od smoka i jest świadoma jego obecności, musi odnieść sukces w rzucie ratunkowym na {@dc 17} Mądrość lub stać się {@condition frightened} na 1 minutę. Stworzenie może powtórzyć rzut ratujący na koniec każdej swojej tury, kończąc efekt na sobie w przypadku sukcesu. Jeśli rzut ratunkowy się powiedzie lub efekt się skończy, stworzenie jest odporne na Przerażającą Obecność Smoka przez następne 24 godziny.

action.name: Psychic Breath {@recharge 5}
entries: The dragon exhales psychic energy in a 90-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a {@dc 20} Intelligence saving throw. On failed save, a creature takes 58 ({@damage 13d8}) psychic damage, it has disadvantage on attack rolls and ability checks, and can't take reactions, until the end of its next turn. On a successful save, a creature takes half as much damage and suffers no other effects.

legendary.name: Detect
entries: The dragon makes a Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) check.

legendary.name: Tail Attack
entries: The dragon makes a Tail attack.

legendary.name: Wing Attack (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: The dragon beats its wings. Each creature within 15 feet of the dragon must succeed on a {@dc 21} Dexterity saving throw or take 14 ({@damage 2d6 + 7}) bludgeoning damage and be knocked {@condition prone}. The dragon can then fly up to half its flying speed.

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
entries: If the dragon fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

trait.name: Mimicry
entries: Smok potrafi naśladować odgłosy zwierząt i głosy humanoidów. Istota, która słyszy te dźwięki może stwierdzić, że są to imitacje z udanym {@dc 14} sprawdzeniem Mądrości ({@skill Insight}).

action.name: Multiattack
entries: Smok może użyć swojej Przerażającej Obecności. Następnie wykonuje jeden atak typu Bite oraz dwa ataki typu Claw.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} +13 to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. {@h}21 ({@damage 4d6 + 7}) piercing damage plus 9 ({@damage 2d8}) acid damage.

action.name: Claw
entries: {@atk mw} +13 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}14 ({@damage 2d6 + 7}) slashing damage.

action.name: Tail
entries: {@atk mw} +13 to hit, reach 20 ft., one target. {@h}21 ({@damage 4d6 + 7}) piercing damage and if the target is a Huge or smaller creature, it is {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 21}). Until this grapple ends, the dragon can automatically hit the target with its tail, and the dragon can't attack another target with its tail.

action.name: Frightful Presence
entries: Each creature of the dragon's choice that is within 120 feet of the dragon and aware of it must succeed on a {@dc 15} Wisdom saving throw or become {@condition frightened} for 1 minute. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. If a creature's saving throw is successful or the effect ends for it, the creature is immune to the dragon's Frightful Presence for the next 24 hours.

action.name: Acid Breath {@recharge 5}
entries: The dragon exhales sticky, corrosive acid in a 90-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a {@dc 21} Dexterity saving throw. On failed save, a creature takes 45 ({@damage 10d8}) acid damage immediately and 22 ({@damage 5d8}) acid damage at the end of its next turn. On a successful save, a creature takes half as much of the initial damage and no damage at the end of its next turn.

legendary.name: Detect
entries: The dragon makes a Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) check.

legendary.name: Tail Attack
entries: The dragon makes a Tail attack.

legendary.name: Wing Attack (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: The dragon beats its wings. Each creature within 15 feet of the dragon must succeed on a {@dc 21} Dexterity saving throw or take 14 ({@damage 2d6 + 7}) bludgeoning damage and be knocked {@condition prone}. The dragon can then fly up to half its flying speed.

trait.name: Hold Breath
entries: The dragon can hold its breath for 1 hour or until it uses its Acid Breath.

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
entries: If the dragon fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

trait.name: Sand Camouflage
entries: Smok ma przewagę w testach Zręczności ({@skill Stealth}) wykonywanych w celu ukrycia się w piaszczystym terenie.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: Smok może użyć swojej Przerażającej Obecności. Następnie wykonuje jeden atak typu Bite oraz dwa ataki typu Claw.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} +13 to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. {@h}18 ({@damage 2d10 + 7}) piercing damage plus 11 ({@damage 2d10}) acid damage.

action.name: Claw
entries: {@atk mw} +13 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}14 ({@damage 2d6 + 7}) slashing damage.

action.name: Tail
entries: {@atk mw} +13 to hit, reach 20 ft., one target. {@h}16 ({@damage 2d8 + 7}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Frightful Presence
entries: Each creature of the dragon's choice that is within 120 feet of the dragon and aware of it must succeed on a {@dc 18} Wisdom saving throw or become {@condition frightened} for 1 minute. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. If a creature's saving throw is successful or the effect ends for it, the creature is immune to the dragon's Frightful Presence for the next 24 hours.

action.name: Acid Breath {@recharge 5}
entries: The dragon exhales corrosive sand in a 90-foot line that is 10 feet wide. Each creature in that area must make a {@dc 21} Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, a creature takes 58 ({@damage 13d8}) acid damage and is {@condition blinded} until the end of its next turn. On a successful save, a creature takes half as much damage and isn't {@condition blinded}.

legendary.name: Detect
entries: The dragon makes a Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) check.

legendary.name: Tail Attack
entries: The dragon makes a Tail attack.

legendary.name: Sand Tornado (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: The dragon burrows into the ground in a violent circling motion, whipping its tail and spraying sand around it. Each creature within 15 feet of the dragon must succeed on a {@dc 21} Constitution saving throw or take 16 ({@damage 2d8 + 7}) bludgeoning damage and be {@condition blinded} until the end of its next turn. The dragon can then move up to its burrow speed.

trait.name: Regeneration
entries: Zemsta odzyskuje 10 punktów trafień na początku swojej tury. Jeśli revenant otrzyma obrażenia od ognia lub promieniowania, cecha ta nie działa na początku kolejnej tury revenanta. Ciało mściciela ulega zniszczeniu tylko wtedy, gdy zaczyna on swoją turę z 0 punktami trafień i nie regeneruje się.

trait.name: Rejuvenation
entries: When the revenant's body is destroyed, its soul lingers. After 24 hours, the soul inhabits and animates another ogre corpse on the same plane of existence and regains all its hit points. While the soul is bodiless, a wish spell can be used to force the soul to go to the afterlife and not return.

trait.name: Turn Immunity
entries: Zemsta jest odporna na efekty, które zmieniają nieumarłych.

trait.name: Vengeful Strikes
entries: If the target hit by the revenant's melee attack is a creature against which the revenant has sworn vengeance, the target takes an extra 10 ({@damage 3d6}) weapon damage.

trait.name: Vengeful Tracker
entries: Zemsta zna odległość i kierunek do każdej istoty, na której szuka zemsty, nawet jeśli istota i zemsta znajdują się na różnych płaszczyznach istnienia. Jeśli istota śledzona przez zemstę zginie, zemsta wie o tym.

action.name: Greatclub
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}14 ({@damage 2d8 + 5}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Javelin
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 30/120 ft., one target. {@h}12 ({@damage 2d6 + 5}) piercing damage.

action.name: Vengeful Glare
entries: The revenant targets one creature it can see within 30 feet of it and against which it has sworn vengeance. The target must make a {@dc 14} Wisdom saving throw. On a failure, the target is {@condition paralyzed} until the revenant deals damage to it, or until the end of the revenant's next turn. When the paralysis ends, the target is {@condition frightened} of the revenant for 1 minute. The {@condition frightened} target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, with disadvantage if it can see the revenant, ending the {@condition frightened} condition on itself on a success.

trait.name: Amorphous
entries: The obliviax can move through a space as narrow as 1 inch wide without squeezing.

trait.name: Detect Spellcaster
entries: The obliviax can sense the presence and location of any creature within 120 feet of it that has the Spellcasting or Pact Magic feature, regardless of interposing barriers, unless the creature is protected by a {@spell nondetection} or {@spell mind blank} spell.

trait.name: False Appearance
entries: While the obliviax remains motionless, it is indistinguishable from a normal patch of moss.

action.name: Slam (Humanoid Form Only)
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d4 + 2}) bludgeoning damage plus 3 ({@damage 1d6}) psychic damage.

action.name: Steal Magical Memory
entries: The obliviax targets one creature it can see within 60 feet of it that has prepared spells. The target takes 7 ({@damage 2d6}) psychic damage, and it must make a {@dc 12} Intelligence saving throw. On a failed save, the target loses {@dice 1d4} prepared spells of 3rd level and below (determined randomly) and the obliviax gains the knowledge of these spells as if it has prepared them after a long rest. In addition, the obliviax gains temporary hit points equal to total level of spells stolen.
The target can regain the lost prepared spells after a long rest.

bonus.name: Copy Shape
entries: The obliviax changes its shape into a faux moss-covered Medium version of the creature it has successfully used Steal Magic Memory on, or back into its true form, which is a 5-foot square patch of moss. Its statistics are the same in each form. Any equipment it is wearing or carrying isn't transformed. It reverts to its true form if it dies.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting (Psionics, Humanoid Form Only, 3/Day)
headerEntries: The obliviax casts one of the spells it has acquired using Steal Magical Memory, requiring no material components and using Wisdom as the spellcasting ability (spell save {@dc 12}, {@hit 4} to hit with spell attacks).

monster.name: Nosferatu Master
languages: The languages it knew in life

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
entries: If the nosferatu fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

trait.name: Regeneration
entries: The nosferatu regains 10 hit points at the start of each of its turns if it has at least 1 hit point and isn't in sunlight. If the nosferatu takes radiant damage, this trait doesn't function until the start of the nosferatu's next turn.

trait.name: Spider Climb
entries: The nosferatu can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

trait.name: Sunlight Hypersensitivity
entries: The nosferatu takes 20 radiant damage when it starts its turn in sunlight. While in sunlight, it has disadvantage on attack rolls and ability checks.

trait.name: Unusual Nature
entries: The nosferatu doesn't require air.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The nosferatu uses Terrifying Presence. It then makes two Claw attacks followed by one Bite attack. If both Claw attacks hit the same creature, the Bite attack is made with advantage.

action.name: Claw
entries: {@atk mw} +11 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}10 ({@damage 1d8 + 6}) slashing damage.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} +11 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. {@h}10 ({@damage 1d8 + 6}) piercing damage plus 10 ({@damage 3d6}) necrotic damage. If the target is missing any of its hit points, it instead takes 16 ({@damage 3d10}) necrotic damage.

The target's hit point maximum is reduced by an amount equal to the necrotic damage taken, and the nosferatu regains hit points equal to that amount. The reduction lasts until the target finishes a long rest. The target dies if its hit point maximum is reduced to 0. A Humanoid slain in this way and then buried in the ground rises as a {@creature nosferatu|MonsterManualExpanded3} after {@dice 1d10} days.

action.name: Terrifying Presence
entries: Each creature of the nosferatu's choice that the nosferatu can see within 120 feet of it must succeed on a {@dc 16} Wisdom saving throw or become {@condition frightened} of the nosferatu for 1 minute. The {@condition frightened} creature is {@condition paralyzed}. The {@condition frightened} creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. If a creature's saving throw is successful or the effect ends for it, the creature is immune to the nosferatu's Terrifying Presence for the next 24 hours.

action.name: Blood Disgorge {@recharge 5}
entries: The nosferatu vomits blood in a 15-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a {@dc 19} Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, a creature takes 27 ({@damage 6d8}) necrotic damage, and it can't regain hit points for 1 minute. On a successful save, the creature takes half as much damage with no additional effects.

legendary.name: Claw
entries: The nosferatu makes one Claw attack.

legendary.name: Mauling Pounce (Costs 3 Actions)
entries: The nosferatu moves up to its speed without provoking {@action opportunity attack|PHB|opportunity attacks}, and it can make one Claw attack against each creature it moves past.

monster.name: Nosferatu Alpha
languages: The languages it knew in life

trait.name: Pack Tactics
entries: The nosferatu has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the nosferatu's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't {@condition incapacitated}.

trait.name: Packmaster
entries: An allied nosferatu that starts its turn within 30 feet of this nosferatu that can see or hear this nosferatu gains Pack Tactics until the start of its next turn, provided this nosferatu isn't {@condition incapacitated}.

trait.name: Regeneration
entries: The nosferatu regains 10 hit points at the start of each of its turns if it has at least 1 hit point and isn't in sunlight. If the nosferatu takes radiant damage, this trait doesn't function until the start of the nosferatu's next turn.

trait.name: Spider Climb
entries: The nosferatu can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

trait.name: Sunlight Hypersensitivity
entries: The nosferatu takes 20 radiant damage when it starts its turn in sunlight. While in sunlight, it has disadvantage on attack rolls and ability checks.

trait.name: Unusual Nature
entries: The nosferatu doesn't require air.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The nosferatu makes two Claw attacks followed by one Bite attack. If both Claw attacks hit the same creature, the Bite attack is made with advantage.

action.name: Claw
entries: {@atk mw} +10 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}10 ({@damage 1d8 + 6}) slashing damage.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} +10 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. {@h}10 ({@damage 1d8 + 6}) piercing damage plus 7 ({@damage 2d6}) necrotic damage. If the target is missing any of its hit points, it instead takes 11 ({@damage 2d10}) necrotic damage.

The target's hit point maximum is reduced by an amount equal to the necrotic damage taken, and the nosferatu regains hit points equal to that amount. The reduction lasts until the target finishes a long rest. The target dies if its hit point maximum is reduced to 0. A Humanoid slain in this way and then buried in the ground rises as a {{@creature nosferatu|MonsterManualExpanded3} after {@dice 1d10} days.

action.name: Blood Disgorge {@recharge 5}
entries: The nosferatu vomits blood in a 15-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a {@dc 18} Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, a creature takes 22 ({@damage 5d8}) necrotic damage, and it can't regain hit points for 1 minute. On a successful save, the creature takes half as much damage with no additional effects.

trait.name: False Appearance
entries: While the noran remains motionless, it is indistinguishable from a normal dead tree.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The noran makes two Claw attacks. If it is grappling with a creature, it can also use its Bite.

action.name: Claw
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}13 ({@damage 2d6 + 6}) slashing damage and the target is {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 16}). Until this grapple ends, the target is {@condition restrained}, the noran can automatically hit the target with its Tail attack. The noran has two claws, each of which can grapple only one target.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target it is grappling with. {@h}16 ({@damage 3d6 + 6}) piercing damage.

action.name: Rock Cannon
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 9} to hit, range 30/120 ft., one target. {@h}33 ({@damage 5d10 + 6}) bludgeoning damage, and the target must succeed on a {@dc 17} Constitution saving throw or become {@condition stunned} until the end of its next turn. If the saving throw fails by 5 or more, the target is knocked {@condition unconscious} for 1 minute. The {@condition unconscious} target repeats the saving throw if it takes damage and at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. The noran must have a rock loaded inside its cannon to use this action.

bonus.name: Load Rock Cannon
entries: The noran loads its cannon with a rock ammunition.

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (2/Day)
entries: If the necromancer fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

trait.name: Spell Penetration
entries: When the necromancer casts a spell and is interrupted by an enemy's {@spell counterspell}, treat the spell's level as 3 levels higher.

trait.name: Supreme Focus
entries: The necromancer has advantage on saving throws it makes to maintain its concentration.

action.name: Withering Touch
entries: {@atk ms} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. {@h}12 ({@damage 5d4}) necrotic damage.

action.name: Entropic Rift {@recharge 5}
entries: The necromancer opens a momentary Abyssal rift within 60 feet of it. The rift is a 20-foot-radius sphere. Each creature in that area must make a {@dc 15} Constitution saving throw, taking 22 ({@damage 5d8}) necrotic damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. In addition, there is a {@chance 50} chance that {@dice 1d4} {@creature wight|mm|wights} then appear in unoccupied spaces in the sphere. They act as the necromancer's allies, take their turns immediately after the necromancer. They remain until destroyed or until the necromancer dismisses them as an action.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: The necromancer casts one of the following spells using Intelligence as the spellcasting ability (spell save {@dc 15}, {@hit 7} to hit with spell attacks):
footerEntries: *The necromancer casts these spells on itself before combat.

legendary.name: Move
entries: The necromancer moves up to half its speed without provoking {@action opportunity attack|PHB|opportunity attacks}.

legendary.name: A Taste of Undeath
entries: The necromancer casts {@spell chill touch}.

legendary.name: Withering Touch
entries: The necromancer attacks with its Withering Touch.

legendary.name: Necromancy (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: The necromancer casts {@spell blight}, {@spell blindness/deafness}, {@spell ray of sickness}, or {@spell vampiric touch}, if available.

trait.name: Demonic Shadows
entries: The nabassu whelp darkens the area around its body in a 10-foot radius. Nonmagical light can't illuminate this area of dim light.

trait.name: Devour Soul
entries: A nabassu whelp can eat the soul of a creature it has killed within the last hour, provided that creature is neither a construct nor an undead. The devouring requires the nabassu whelp to be within 5 feet of the corpse for at least 10 minutes, after which it gains a number of Hit Dice (d6s) equal to half the creature's number of Hit Dice, up to a maximum total of 14 Hit Dice. Roll those dice, and increase the nabassu whelp's hit points by the numbers rolled. For every 4 Hit Dice the nabassu whelp gains in this way, its attacks deal an extra 3 ({@damage 1d6}) damage on a hit. The nabassu whelp retains these benefits for 6 days. A creature devoured by a nabassu whelp can be restored to life only by a wish spell.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The nabassu whelp has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Magic Weapons
entries: The nabassu whelp's weapon attacks are magical.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The nabassu whelp uses its Soul-Stealing Gaze and makes two attacks: one with its Claws and one with its Bite.

action.name: Claws
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d10 + 3}) slashing damage.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}16 ({@damage 2d12 + 3}) piercing damage.

action.name: Soul-Stealing Gaze
entries: The nabassu whelp targets one creature it can see within 30 feet of it. If the target can see the nabassu whelp and isn't a construct or an undead, it must succeed on a {@dc 13} Charisma saving throw or reduce its hit point maximum by 6 ({@damage 1d12}) and give the nabassu whelp an equal number of temporary hit points. This reduction lasts until the target finishes a short or long rest. The target dies if its hit point maximum is reduced to 0, and if the target is a humanoid, it immediately rises as a ghoul under the nabassu whelp's control.

trait.name: Keen Smell
entries: The musteval has advantage on Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) checks that rely on smell.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The musteval has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Speak With Beasts
entries: The musteval can communicate with beasts as if they shared a language.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The musteval makes one Dagger attack and casts one spell that takes 1 action to cast.

action.name: Dagger
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d4 + 4}) piercing damage. The attack deals an extra 3 ({@damage 1d6}) damage if the musteval has advantage on the attack roll.

action.name: Cunning Action
entries: On each of its turns, the musteval can use a bonus action to take the {@action Dash}, {@action Disengage}, or {@action Hide} action.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: The musteval casts one of the following spells, requiring no material components and using Charisma as the spellcasting ability (spell save {@dc 13}):

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (2/Day)
entries: If the monk fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

trait.name: Unarmored Defense
entries: While the monk is wearing no armor and wielding no shield, its AC includes its Wisdom modifier.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The monk makes four Unarmed Strikes or four Dart attacks.

action.name: Unarmed Strike
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}9 ({@damage 1d10 + 4}) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a creature, the monk can choose one of the following additional effects:

items: The target must succeed on a {@dc 16} Strength saving throw or drop one item it is holding (monk's choice).
The target must succeed on a {@dc 16} Dexterity saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone}.
The target must succeed on a {@dc 16} Constitution saving throw or be {@condition stunned} until the end of the monk's next turn.

action.name: Dart
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 8} to hit, range 20/60 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d4 + 4}) piercing damage.

reaction.name: Deflect Missile
entries: In response to being hit by a ranged weapon attack, the monk deflects the missile. The damage it takes from the attack is reduced by 25 ({@damage 1d10 + 20}). If the damage is reduced to 0, the monk catches the missile if it's small enough to hold in one hand and the monk has a hand free.

legendary.name: Detect
entries: The monk makes a Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) check.

legendary.name: Tumble, Slide, and Flip
entries: The monk moves up to half its speed without provoking {@action opportunity attack|PHB|opportunity attacks}. During this move, the monk can enter creatures' spaces but can't end its turn there.

legendary.name: Attack
entries: The monk makes an Unarmed Strike or attacks with its Dart.

legendary.name: Dodge (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: The monk performs a {@action Dodge} Action. Until the start of the monk's next turn, it can't use {@action Attack} as a legendary action.

monster.name: Mithral Golem

immune.note: from nonmagical attacks that aren't adamantine

languages: understands the languages of its creator but can't speak

trait.name: Immutable Form
entries: Golem jest odporny na wszelkie zaklęcia i efekty, które mogłyby zmienić jego formę.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: Golem ma przewagę w rzutach ratunkowych przeciwko zaklęciom i innym efektom magicznym.

trait.name: Magic Weapons
entries: Ataki bronią golema są magiczne.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The golem makes two Slam attacks.

action.name: Slam
entries: {@atk mw} +15 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}27 ({@damage 4d8 + 9}) bludgeoning damage and if the target is a Large or smaller creature, it is {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 23}). Until this grapple ends, the golem can automatically hit the target with its slam attack, and the golem can't attack another target with one of its slam attacks.

action.name: Bludgeon
entries: The golem slams creatures grappled by it into each other or a solid surface. Each creature must succeed on a {@dc 23} Constitution saving throw or take 27 ({@damage 4d8 + 9}) bludgeoning damage and be {@condition stunned} until the end of the golem's next turn. On a successful save, the target takes half the bludgeoning damage and isn't {@condition stunned}.

action.name: Crushing Stride
entries: he golem moves up to its speed in a straight line. During this move, it can enter Large or smaller creatures' spaces. A creature whose space the golem enters must succeed on a {@dc 23} Dexterity saving throw. On a successful save, the creature is pushed 5 feet to the nearest space out of the golem's path. On a failed save, the creature falls {@condition prone} and takes 27 ({@damage 4d8 + 9}) bludgeoning damage. If the golem remains in the prone creature's space, the creature is also {@condition restrained} until it's no longer in the same space as the golem. While {@condition restrained} in this way, the creature, or another creature within 5 feet of it, can make a {@dc 23} Strength check. On a success, the creature is shunted to an unoccupied space of its choice within 5 feet of the golem and is no longer {@condition restrained}.

bonus.name: Alacrity
entries: The golem can take the {@action Attack} (one weapon attack only), {@action Dash}, {@action Disengage}, {@action Hide}, or {@action Use an Object} action.

trait.name: Aura of Debilitating Cold
entries: Any creature that starts its turn within 5 feet of the mavawhan takes 3 ({@damage 1d6}) cold damage and has disadvantage to saving throws against cold damage until the start of its next turn.

trait.name: Ice Walk
entries: The mavawhan can move across and climb icy surfaces without needing to make an ability check. Additionally, difficult terrain composed of ice or snow doesn't cost it extra moment.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The mavawhan has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The mavawhan makes three attacks: two with its Claw and one with its Gore attack or Stinger.

action.name: Claw
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) slashing damage plus 3 ({@damage 1d6}) cold damage.

action.name: Gore
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}12 ({@damage 2d8 + 3}) piercing damage plus 3 ({@damage 1d6}) cold damage.

action.name: Stinger
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 10 ft., one creature. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d4 + 3}) piercing damage, and the target must succeed on a {@dc 14} Constitution saving throw or take 7 ({@damage 2d6}) cold damage and have its Dexterity reduced by {@dice 1d6}. This reduction lasts until the target finishes a short or long rest. If a target's Dexterity is reduced to 0, the creature becomes {@condition petrified} and its whole body transforms into frozen ice until freed by the {@spell greater restoration} spell or other magic. On a successful save, the target takes half as much damage and doesn't have its Dexterity reduced.

action.name: Teleport
entries: The mavawhan magically teleports, along with any equipment it is wearing or carrying, up to 120 feet to an unoccupied space it can see.

action.name: Fan of Ice Blades {@recharge 5}
entries: The mavawhan whirls its wings around, unleashing icy spikes that strike targets around it. Each creature within 30 feet of it must succeed on a {@dc 14} Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, a creature takes 10 ({@damage 3d6}) piercing damage and 10 ({@damage 3d6}) cold damage and can't use reactions until the end of its next turn. On a successful saving throw, a creature takes half as much damage.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: The mavawhan casts one of the following spells, requiring no material components and using Charisma as the spellcasting ability (spell save {@dc 14}):

trait.name: Regeneration
entries: Zemsta odzyskuje 10 punktów trafień na początku swojej tury. Jeśli revenant otrzyma obrażenia od ognia lub promieniowania, cecha ta nie działa na początku kolejnej tury revenanta. Ciało mściciela ulega zniszczeniu tylko wtedy, gdy zaczyna on swoją turę z 0 punktami trafień i nie regeneruje się.

trait.name: Rejuvenation
entries: When the revenant's body is destroyed, its soul lingers. After 24 hours, the soul inhabits and animates another manticore corpse on the same plane of existence and regains all its hit points. While the soul is bodiless, a wish spell can be used to force the soul to go to the afterlife and not return.

trait.name: Turn Immunity
entries: Zemsta jest odporna na efekty, które zmieniają nieumarłych.

trait.name: Vengeful Strikes
entries: If the target hit by the revenant's melee attack is a creature against which the revenant has sworn vengeance, the target takes an extra 10 ({@damage 3d6}) weapon damage.

trait.name: Vengeful Tracker
entries: Zemsta zna odległość i kierunek do każdej istoty, na której szuka zemsty, nawet jeśli istota i zemsta znajdują się na różnych płaszczyznach istnienia. Jeśli istota śledzona przez zemstę zginie, zemsta wie o tym.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The revenant makes three attacks. one Bite attack and two Claws attacks, or three Tail Spike attacks.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d8 + 4}) piercing damage.

action.name: Claw
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d6 + 4}) slashing damage.

action.name: Tail Spike
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 6} to hit, range 100/200 ft., one target. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d8 + 4}) piercing damage.

action.name: Vengeful Glare
entries: The revenant targets one creature it can see within 30 feet of it and against which it has sworn vengeance. The target must make a {@dc 14} Wisdom saving throw. On a failure, the target is {@condition paralyzed} until the revenant deals damage to it, or until the end of the revenant's next turn. When the paralysis ends, the target is {@condition frightened} of the revenant for 1 minute. The {@condition frightened} target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, with disadvantage if it can see the revenant, ending the {@condition frightened} condition on itself on a success.

trait.name: Shapechanger
entries: At night, the manananggal can use its action to polymorph into its Fiend Form or back into its true form, which is humanoid. In Fiend Form, the manananggal appears as a disembodied upper body of a vampire with bat-like wings. Its statistics, other than its Speed, damage, and damage resistances, are the same in each form. It reverts to its true form at dawn or if it dies. While transformed, the manananggal also gains the following features.

items: The manananggal's creature type changes to fiend.
The manananggal has advantage on Strength and Dexterity checks and Strength and Dexterity saving throws.
When it makes a melee weapon attack, the manananggal gains a {@hit 3} bonus to the damage roll (included in the attack).
The manananggal can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.
If the manananggal starts its turn within 10 feet of a pound of salt or garlic, it becomes {@condition poisoned} until the start of its next turn.

trait.name: Horrific Appearance (Fiend Form Only)
entries: Any humanoid that starts its turn within 30 feet of the manananggal and can see the manananggal must make a {@dc 13} Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, the creature is {@condition frightened} for 1 minute. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, with disadvantage if the manananggal is within line of sight, ending the effect on itself on a success. If a creature's saving throw is successful or the effect ends for it, the creature is immune to the manananggal 's Horrific Appearance for the next 24 hours.

Unless the target is surprised or the revelation of the manananggal's Fiend Form is sudden, the target can avert its eyes and avoid making the initial saving throw. Until the start of its next turn, a creature that averts its eyes has disadvantage on attack rolls against the manananggal.

trait.name: Self-segmentation
entries: When the manananggal transforms into its Fiend Form, its upper body separates from its lower body. Its upper body becomes the active creature, while its lower body becomes {@condition incapacitated}. While the two bodies are part of the same creature, each is treated as a separate entity, with the upper body having its full hit poins and its lower body having 1 hit point per HD and retaining its standard humanoid statistics. Before it can revert to its true form, the manananggal must use its action to graft back with its lower body.

If the lower body is destroyed, or its exposed separation point is covered with at least a pound of garlic or salt or a mixture of both, the manananggal can't graft with its lower body. If the manananggal is unable to rejoin its lower body by dawn, it and its lower body take 10 necrotic damage when it starts its turn.

trait.name: Keen Hearing And Smell
entries: The manananggal has advantage on Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) checks that rely on hearing or smell.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The manananggal makes two attacks. two with its Dagger (humanoid form) or one with its Bite and one with its Claws (fiend form).

action.name: Bite (Fiend Form Only)
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d6 + 5}) piercing damage, and the manananggal gains temporary hit points equal to the damage dealt.

action.name: Claws (Fiend Form Only)
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. Hit: 12 ({@damage 2d6 + 5}) slashing damage.

action.name: Dagger (Humanoid Form Only)
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d4 + 2}) piercing damage.

monster.name: Maligno

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (2/Day)
entries: If the maligno fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The maligno has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Plant Camouflage
entries: The maligno has advantage on Dexterity ({@skill Stealth}) checks it makes in any terrain with ample obscuring plant life.

trait.name: Regeneration
entries: The maligno regains 10 hit points at the start of its turn if it is within 120 feet of its grove. If the maligno takes fire or radiant damage, this trait doesn't function at the start of the maligno's next turn. The maligno's body is destroyed only if it starts its turn with 0 hit points and doesn't regenerate.

trait.name: Speak With Beasts And Plants
entries: The maligno can communicate with beasts and plants as if they and the maligno shared a language.

trait.name: Spell Penetration
entries: When the maligno casts a spell and is interrupted by an enemy's {@spell counterspell}, treat the spell's level as 3 levels higher.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The maligno can use its Bewildering Presence. It then makes two Claw attacks.

action.name: Claw
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d6 + 4}) slashing damage plus 7 ({@damage 2d6}) necrotic damage, and the target must succeed on a {@dc 17} Constitution saving throw or its hit point maximum is reduced by an amount equal to the necrotic damage taken. This reduction lasts until the target finishes a long rest. The target dies if this effect reduces its hit point maximum to 0.

action.name: Terrifying Presence
entries: Each creature of the maligno's choice that the maligno can see within 120 feet of it must succeed on a {@dc 17} Wisdom saving throw or become {@condition frightened} of the maligno for 1 minute. The {@condition frightened} creature is {@condition paralyzed}. The {@condition frightened} creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. If a creature's saving throw is successful or the effect ends for it, the creature is immune to the maligno's Terrifying Presence for the next 24 hours.

action.name: Change Shape
entries: The maligno magically polymorphs into a Mediumsized humanoid. It can revert to its true form as a bonus action. Its statistics, other than its size, are the same in each form. Any equipment it is wearing or carrying isn't transformed. It reverts to its true form if it dies.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: The maligno casts one of the following spells, requiring no material components and using Charisma as the spellcasting ability (spell save {@dc 17}, {@hit 9} to hit with spell attacks):

legendaryHeader: The maligno gains 3 legendary actions, choosing from the options below. Only one legendary action option can be used at a time and only at the end of another creature's turn. The maligno regains spent legendary actions at the start of its turn.

legendary.name: Move
entries: The maligno moves up to half its speed without provoking {@action opportunity attack|PHB|opportunity attacks}.

legendary.name: Claw
entries: The maligno makes a Claw attack.

legendary.name: Debilitating Gaze
entries: The maligno turns its magical gaze toward one living creature it can see within 30 feet of it. The target must succeed on a {@dc 17} Constitution saving throw or take 7 ({@damage 2d6}) necrotic damage and gain 1 level of {@condition exhaustion}.

legendary.name: Cast Spell (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: The maligno uses Spellcasting.

trait.name: Blood Frenzy
entries: The malenti has advantage on melee attack rolls against any creature that doesn't have all its hit points.

trait.name: Limited Amphibiousness
entries: The malenti can breathe air and water, but it needs to be submerged at least once every 4 hours to avoid suffocating.

trait.name: Shark Telepathy
entries: The malenti can magically command any shark within 120 feet of it, using a limited telepathy.

trait.name: Sneak Attack (1/Turn)
entries: The malenti deals an extra 3 ({@damage 1d6}) damage when it hits a target with a weapon attack and has advantage on the attack roll, or when the target is within 5 feet of an ally of the malenti that isn't {@condition incapacitated} and the malenti doesn't have disadvantage on the attack roll.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The malenti makes two melee attacks. one with its Bite and one with its Claws or Spear.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d3 + 2}) piercing damage.

action.name: Claws
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d3 + 2}) slashing damage.

action.name: Spear
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) piercing damage, or 6 ({@damage 1d8 + 2}) piercing damage if used with two hands to make a melee attack.

action.name: Cunning Action
entries: On each of its turns, the malenti can use a bonus action to take the {@action Dash}, {@action Disengage}, or {@action Hide} action.

trait.name: Heated Body
entries: A creature that touches the paraelemental or hits it with a melee attack while within 5 feet of it takes 5 ({@damage 1d10}) fire damage.

trait.name: Heated Weapons
entries: When the paraelemental hits with a metal melee weapon, it deals an extra 3 ({@damage 1d6}) fire damage (included in the attack).

trait.name: Illumination
entries: The paraelemental sheds bright light in a 10-foot radius and dim light in an additional 10 feet.

trait.name: Siege Monster
entries: The paraelemental deals double damage to objects and structures.

trait.name: Water Susceptibility
entries: For every 10 feet the paraelemental moves in water, or for every 2 gallons of water splashed on it, it takes 1 cold damage.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The paraelemental makes two Slam attacks.

action.name: Slam
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}11 ({@damage 2d8 + 2}) bludgeoning damage plus 3 ({@damage 1d6}) fire damage. If the target is a creature or a flammable object, it ignites. Until a creature takes an action to douse the fire, the target takes 5 ({@damage 1d10}) fire damage at the start of each of its turns.

action.name: Hurl Magma
entries: {@atk rs} {@hit 5} to hit, range 30 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d10}) fire damage. If the target is a creature or a flammable object, it ignites. Until a creature takes an action to douse the fire, the target takes 5 ({@damage 1d10}) fire damage at the start of each of its turns.

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (2/Day)
entries: If the mage fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

trait.name: Spell Penetration
entries: When the mage casts a spell and is interrupted by an enemy's {@spell counterspell}, treat the spell's level as 3 levels higher.

trait.name: Supreme Focus
entries: The mage has advantage on saving throws it makes to maintain its concentration.

action.name: Dagger
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d4 + 2}) piercing damage.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: The mage casts one of the following spells using Intelligence as the spellcasting ability (spell save {@dc 16}, {@hit 8} to hit with spell attacks):
footerEntries: *The mage casts these spells on itself before combat.

legendary.name: Move
entries: The mage moves up to half its speed without provoking {@action opportunity attack|PHB|opportunity attacks}.

legendary.name: Fire Bolt
entries: The mage casts {@spell fire bolt}.

legendary.name: Dagger
entries: The mage attacks with its Dagger.

legendary.name: Evocation (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: The mage casts {@spell magic missile}, {@spell scorching ray}, or {@spell thunderwave}, if available.

trait.name: Keen Hearing And Smell
entries: The sphinx has advantage on Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) checks that rely on hearing or smell.

trait.name: Inscrutable
entries: The sphinx is immune to any effect that would sense its emotions or read its thoughts, as well as any divination spell that it refuses. Wisdom ({@skill Insight}) checks made to ascertain the sphinx's intentions or sincerity have disadvantage.

trait.name: Magic Weapons
entries: The sphinx's weapon attacks are magical.

trait.name: Pack Tactics
entries: The sphinx has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the sphinx's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't {@condition incapacitated}.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The sphinx makes one Bite attack and two Claw attacks. If both Claw attacks hit the same target, the target takes an extra 4 ({@damage 1d8}) slashing damage.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}10 ({@damage 2d6 + 3}) piercing damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a {@dc 13} Strength saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone}.

action.name: Claw
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) slashing damage.

action.name: Howl (2/Day)
entries: The sphinx emits a magical howl. Each enemy creature within 100 feet of the sphinx and able to hear the howl must make a {@dc 13} Wisdom saving throw or become {@condition frightened} for 1 minute. A {@condition frightened} creature must spend its turns trying to move as far away from the sphinx as it can, and it can't willingly move to a space within 30 feet of it. The {@condition frightened} creature also can't take reactions. For its action, it can use only the {@action Dash} action or try to escape from an effect that prevents it from moving. If there's nowhere to move, the creature can use the {@action Dodge} action. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

legendary.name: Claw Attack
entries: The sphinx makes one Claw attack.

legendary.name: Teleport (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: The sphinx magically teleports, along with any equipment it is wearing or carrying, up to 60 feet to an unoccupied space it can see.

legendary.name: Raking Pounce (Costs 3 Actions)
entries: The sphinx moves up to its speed and makes two Claw attacks. If both Claw attacks hit the same target, the target takes an extra 4 ({@damage 1d8}) slashing damage.

trait.name: Keen Smell
entries: The lupinal has advantage on Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) checks that rely on smell.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The lupinal has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Pack Tactics
entries: The lupinal has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the lupinal's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't {@condition incapacitated}.

trait.name: Speak With Beasts
entries: The lupinal can communicate with beasts as if they shared a language.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The lupinal makes two melee attacks.

action.name: Scimitar
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d6 + 4}) slashing damage.

action.name: Claw
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d4 + 4}) slashing damage.

action.name: Howl (1/Day)
entries: The lupinal emits a magical howl. Each enemy creature within 300 feet of the lupinal and able to hear the howl must make a {@dc 14} Wisdom saving throw or become {@condition frightened} for 1 minute. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

action.name: Two-Weapon Fighting
entries: As a bonus action when the lupinal takes the {@action Attack} action or uses Multiattack, it can make one melee weapon attack.

bonus.name: Ethereal Jaunt
entries: The lupinal magically shifts from the Material Planeto the Ethereal Plane, or vice versa.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: The lupinal casts one of the following spells, requiring no material components and using Charisma as the spellcasting ability (spell save {@dc 14}):

trait.name: Aura of Protection
entries: Each ally within 20 feet of the leonal has advantage on saving throws against being charmed and {@condition frightened}.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The leonal has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Speak With Beasts
entries: The leonal can communicate with beasts as if they shared a language.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The leonal makes two melee attacks and uses Divine Roar, if available.

action.name: Greataxe
entries: {@atk mw} +10 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}12 ({@damage 1d12 + 6}) slashing damage plus 9 ({@damage 2d8}) radiant damage.

action.name: Claw
entries: {@atk mw} +10 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}10 ({@damage 1d8 + 6}) slashing damage and if the target is a Large or smaller creature, it is {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 18}). Until this grapple ends, the target is {@condition restrained}.

action.name: Divine Roar (1/Day)
entries: The leonal emits a magical roar. Each evil creature within 60 feet of the leonal must make a {@dc 16} Charisma saving throw. On a failed save, a creature takes 13 ({@damage 3d8}) thunder damage and suffers an effect based on its current Hit Points:

items: 50 hit points or fewer: {@condition deafened} for 1 minute
40 hit points or fewer: {@condition deafened} and {@condition blinded} for 10 minutes
30 hit points or fewer: {@condition blinded}, {@condition deafened}, and {@condition stunned} for 1 hour
20 hit points or fewer: killed instantly

entries: On a successful save, a creature takes half as much damage and suffers no other effects.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: The leonal casts one of the following spells, requiring no material components and using Charisma as the spellcasting ability (spell save {@dc 16}):

trait.name: Aura of Menace
entries: The archon emanates an aura of menace in a 30-foot radius. The first time any enemy creature enters the aura or starts its turn there during a battle, the creature must succeed on a {@dc 12} Wisdom saving throw or become {@condition frightened} of the archon for 1 minute or until it takes any damage.

trait.name: Illumination
entries: The archon sheds bright light in a 10-foot radius and dim light for an additional 10 feet.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: Archont ma przewagę w rzutach ratunkowych przeciwko zaklęciom i innym efektom magicznym.

action.name: Light Ray
entries: {@atk rs} {@hit 4} to hit, range 30 ft., one target. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d8}) radiant damage, and the next attack roll made against this target before the end of the archon's next turn has advantage.

action.name: Teleport
entries: The archon magically teleports, along with any equipment it is wearing or carrying and any creatures it has grappled, up to 60 feet to an unoccupied space it can see.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: The archon casts one of the following spells, requiring no material components and using Charisma as its spellcasting ability:

trait.name: Pounce
entries: If the lammasu moves at least 20 feet straight toward a creature and then hits it with a Claw attack on the same turn, that target must succeed on a {@dc 16} Strength saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone}.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The lammasu makes two Claw attacks. If both Claw attacks hit the same target, the target takes an extra 9 ({@damage 2d8}) slashing damage.

action.name: Claw
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d8 + 4}) slashing damage plus 4 ({@damage 1d8}) radiant damage.

action.name: Breath {@recharge 5}
entries: The lammasu exhales fire in a 30-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a {@dc 13} Dexterity saving throw, taking 40 ({@damage 9d8}) fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

action.name: Preserve Life (1/Day)
entries: The lammasu chooses any number of creatures it can see within 30 feet of it. The lammasu restores 60 hit points, divided among the target creatures. The lammasu can restore no more than half of a creature's hit point maximum.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: The lammasu casts one of the following spells using Wisdom as the spellcasting ability (spell save {@dc 17}, {@hit 9} to hit with spell attacks):

trait.name: Pounce
entries: If the lammasu moves at least 20 feet straight toward a creature and then hits it with a Claw attack on the same turn, that target must succeed on a {@dc 13} Strength saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone}.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The lammasu makes two Claw attacks. If both Claw attacks hit the same target, the target takes an extra 9 ({@damage 2d8}) slashing damage.

action.name: Claw
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) slashing damage.

action.name: Fire Breath {@recharge 5}
entries: The lammasu exhales fire in a 30-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a {@dc 13} Dexterity saving throw, taking 27 ({@damage 6d8}) fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: The lammasu casts one of the following spells using Wisdom as the spellcasting ability (spell save {@dc 14}, {@hit 6} to hit with spell attacks):

trait.name: Amphibious
entries: The kuo-toa can breathe air and water.

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (1/Day)
entries: If the kuo-toa fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

trait.name: Otherworldly Perception
entries: The kuo-toa can sense the presence of any creature within 30 feet of it that is invisible or on the Ethereal Plane. It can pinpoint such a creature that is moving.

trait.name: Slippery
entries: The kuo-toa has advantage on ability checks and saving throws made to escape a grapple.

trait.name: Sunlight Sensitivity
entries: While in sunlight, the kuo-toa has disadvantage on attack rolls, as well as on Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) checks that rely on sight.

trait.name: Spell Penetration
entries: When the kuo-toa casts a spell and is interrupted by an enemy's {@spell counterspell}, treat the spell's level as 3 levels higher.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The kuo-toa makes two melee attacks or makes one melee attack and casts one spell that takes 1 action to cast.

action.name: Pincer Staff
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) piercing damage plus 17 ({@damage 5d6}) lightning damage. If the target is a Medium or smaller creature, it is {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 14}). Until this grapple ends, the kuo-toa can't use its pincer staff on another target.

action.name: Unarmed Strike
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d4 + 3}) bludgeoning damage and the creature must succeed on a {@dc 15} Constitution saving throw or be {@condition stunned} until the end of the kuo-toa's next turn.

reaction.name: Protective Fanatic
entries: When the kuo-toa is hit by an attack, one ally within 15 feet of the kuo-toa must use its reaction to move up to half its speed toward the kuo-toa. If the ally ends its movement within 5 feet of the kuo-toa, it is hit by the attack instead.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: The kuo-toa casts one of the following spells using Wisdom as the spellcasting ability (spell save {@dc 15}, {@hit 7} to hit with spell attacks):

legendary.name: Move
entries: The kuo-toa moves up to half its speed without provoking {@action opportunity attack|PHB|opportunity attacks}.

legendary.name: Unarmed Strike
entries: The kuo-toa makes an Unarmed Strike.

legendary.name: Pincer Staff (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: The kuo-toa attacks with its Pincer Staff.

legendary.name: Cast a Spell (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: The kuo-toa uses Spellcasting.

trait.name: Aura of Madness
entries: If the kuo-toa isn't {@condition incapacitated}, a creature that isn't a kuo-toa that starts its turn within 10 feet of the kuo-toa takes 3 ({@damage 1d6}) psychic damage and has disadvantage on Intelligence, Wisdom, and Charisma saving throws until the start of its next turn.

trait.name: Amphibious
entries: The kuo-toa can breathe air and water.

trait.name: Otherworldly Perception
entries: The kuo-toa can sense the presence of any creature within 30 feet of it that is invisible or on the Ethereal Plane. It can pinpoint such a creature that is moving.

trait.name: Slippery
entries: The kuo-toa has advantage on ability checks and saving throws made to escape a grapple.

trait.name: Sunlight Sensitivity
entries: While in sunlight, the kuo-toa has disadvantage on attack rolls, as well as on Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) checks that rely on sight.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d4 + 2}) piercing damage plus 3 ({@damage 1d6}) psychic damage.

action.name: Eldritch Scream {@recharge 5}
entries: The kuo-toa emits a psionic, mind twisting scream. Each creature within 30 feet of it that can hear it must succeed on a {@dc 12} Intelligence saving throw. On a failed save, the target takes 14 ({@damage 4d6}) psychic damage and suffers the effect of the {@spell confusion} spell without making a saving throw. The effect lasts until the end of the kuo-toa's next turn. On a successful save, the creature takes half as much damage and isn't confused.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: The kuo-toa casts one of the following spells using Charisma as the spellcasting ability (spell save {@dc 12}, {@hit 4} to hit with spell attacks):

trait.name: Amphibious
entries: The kuo-toa can breathe air and water.

trait.name: Otherworldly Perception
entries: The kuo-toa can sense the presence of any creature within 30 feet of it that is invisible or on the Ethereal Plane. It can pinpoint such a creature that is moving.

trait.name: Slippery
entries: The kuo-toa has advantage on ability checks and saving throws made to escape a grapple.

trait.name: Sunlight Sensitivity
entries: While in sunlight, the kuo-toa has disadvantage on attack rolls, as well as on Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) checks that rely on sight.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The kuo-toa makes three melee attacks. one with its Bite and two with its Claw.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}21 ({@damage 3d10 + 5}) piercing damage and if the target is a Large or smaller creature, it is {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 15}). Until this grapple ends, the creature is {@condition restrained}.

action.name: Claw
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}12 ({@damage 2d6 + 5}) bludgeoning damage, and the target is {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 15}). Until the grapple ends, the creature is {@condition restrained}. The kuo-toa has two claws, each of which can grapple only one target.

action.name: Tail
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} to hit, reach 15 ft., one target not grappled by the kuo-toa. {@h}18 ({@damage 3d8 + 5}) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a {@dc 17} Strength saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone}. If the creature fails its saving throw by 5 or more, it is also {@condition stunned} until the end of its next turn.

action.name: Swallow
entries: The kuo-toa makes a Bite attack against a Large or smaller creature it is grappling. If the attack hits, the creature is swallowed, and the grapple ends. The swallowed creature is {@condition blinded} and {@condition restrained}, it has total cover against attacks and other effects outside the kuo-toa, and it takes 10 ({@damage 3d6}) acid damage at the start of each of the kuo-toa's turns.

The kuo-toa can have only one creature swallowed at a time. If the kuo-toa takes 15 damage or more on a single turn from a creature inside it, the kuo-toa must succeed on a {@dc 14} Constitution saving throw at the end of that turn or regurgitate the swallowed creature, which falls {@condition prone} in a space within 5 feet of the kuo-toa. If the kuo-toa dies, a swallowed creature is no longer {@condition restrained} by it and can escape from the corpse by using 5 feet of movement, exiting {@condition prone}.

legendary.name: Move
entries: The kuo-toa moves up to half its speed.

legendary.name: Claw
entries: The kuo-toa makes a Claw attack.

legendary.name: Tail (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: The kuo-toa makes a Tail attack.

legendary.name: Wave Lash (Costs 3 Actions)
entries: The kuo-toa spins violently, whipping its claws and tail and creating a powerful wave of water to crash around it. Each creature within 20 feet of the kuo-toa must succeed on a {@dc 17} Strength saving throw. On a failed save, a creature takes 18 ({@damage 3d8 + 5}) bludgeoning damage, pushed up to 15 feet away and be knocked {@condition prone}. On a successful save, the creature takes half as much damage and isn't pushed or knocked {@condition prone}. The kuo-toa must be in water that is at least 15 feet wide and 10 feet deep to use this action.

trait.name: Amphibious
entries: The kuo-toa can breathe air and water.

trait.name: Otherworldly Perception
entries: The kuo-toa can sense the presence of any creature within 30 feet of it that is invisible or on the Ethereal Plane. It can pinpoint such a creature that is moving.

trait.name: Slippery
entries: The kuo-toa has advantage on ability checks and saving throws made to escape a grapple.

trait.name: Sunlight Sensitivity
entries: While in sunlight, the kuo-toa has disadvantage on attack rolls, as well as on Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) checks that rely on sight.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The kuo-toa makes two melee attacks. one with its Bite and one with its Trident.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d4 + 2}) piercing damage.

action.name: Trident
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) piercing damage, or 6 ({@damage 1d8 + 2}) piercing damage if used with two hands to make a melee attack, plus 10 ({@damage 3d6}) lightning damage, and the target can't take reactions until the end of the kuo-toa's next turn.

action.name: Forked Lightning {@recharge 5}
entries: The kuo-toa unleashes a bolt of lightning that arcs toward a target of its choice that it can see within 60 feet of it. Two bolts then leap from that target to as many as two other targets, each of which must be within 15 feet of the first target. A target can be a creature or an object and can be targeted by only one of the bolts. Each target must make a {@dc 13} Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, a target takes 18 ({@damage 4d8}) lightning damage and is {@condition incapacitated} until the end of the kuo-toa's next turn. On a successful save, a target takes half as much damage and isn't {@condition incapacitated}.

reaction.name: Sticky Shield
entries: When a creature misses the kuo-toa with a melee weapon attack, the kuo-toa uses its sticky shield to catch the weapon. The attacker must succeed on a {@dc 11} Strength saving throw, or the weapon becomes stuck to the kuo-toa's shield. If the weapon's wielder can't or won't let go of the weapon, the wielder is {@condition grappled} while the weapon is stuck. While stuck, the weapon can't be used. A creature can pull the weapon free by taking an action to make a {@dc 11} Strength check and succeeding.

trait.name: Amphibious
entries: The kuo-toa can breathe air and water.

trait.name: Discern Lie
entries: The kuo-toa knows when it hears a creature speak a lie in a language it knows.

trait.name: Otherworldly Perception
entries: The kuo-toa can sense the presence of any creature within 30 feet of it that is invisible or on the Ethereal Plane. It can pinpoint such a creature that is moving.

trait.name: Slippery
entries: The kuo-toa has advantage on ability checks and saving throws made to escape a grapple.

trait.name: Sunlight Sensitivity
entries: While in sunlight, the kuo-toa has disadvantage on attack rolls, as well as on Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) checks that rely on sight.

trait.name: Sneak Attack (1/Turn)
entries: The kuo-toa deals an extra 7 ({@damage 2d6}) damage when it hits a target with a weapon attack and has advantage on the attack roll, or when the target is within 5 feet of an ally of the kuo-toa that isn't {@condition incapacitated} and the kuo-toa doesn't have disadvantage on the attack roll.

trait.name: Spell Penetration
entries: When the kuo-toa casts a spell and is interrupted by an enemy's {@spell counterspell}, treat the spell's level as 3 levels higher.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The kuo-toa makes two melee attacks. one with its Bite and one with its Spear.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d4 + 3}) piercing damage.

action.name: Spear
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) piercing damage, or 7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) piercing damage if used with two hands to make a melee attack, plus 7 ({@damage 2d6}) poison damage.

action.name: Light Crossbow
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 6} to hit, range 80/320 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) piercing damage plus 7 ({@damage 2d6}) poison damage.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: The kuo-toa casts one of the following spells using Wisdom as the spellcasting ability (spell save {@dc 14}, {@hit 6} to hit with spell attacks):

legendary.name: Move
entries: The kuo-toa moves up to half its speed without provoking {@action opportunity attack|PHB|opportunity attacks}.

legendary.name: Malediction
entries: The kuo-toa casts bane, blindness/deafness, command or {@spell hold person}.

legendary.name: Attack (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: The kuo-toa makes a melee or ranged attack.

trait.name: Shapechanger
entries: At night, the kubot can use her action to polymorph into her Fiend Form or back into her true form, which is humanoid. In Fiend Form, the kubot appears as a female vampire with enormous flowing hair. Her statistics, other than her Speed, damage, and damage resistances, are the same in each form. She reverts to her true form at dawn or if she dies. While transformed, the kubot also gains the following features.

items: The kubot's creature type changes to fiend.
The kubot has advantage on Strength and Dexterity checks and Strength and Dexterity saving throws.
When she makes a melee weapon attack, the kubot gains a {@hit 3} bonus to the damage roll (included in the attack).
The kubot can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.
If the kubot starts her turn within 10 feet of a pound of salt or garlic, she becomes {@condition poisoned} until the start of its next turn.

trait.name: Keen Hearing And Smell
entries: The kubot has advantage on Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) checks that rely on hearing or smell.

trait.name: Rapid Aging
entries: The kubot ages 1 year each day.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The kubot makes two attacks. two with its Dagger (humanoid form) or one with her Hair Wrap and one with her Claws (fiend form).

action.name: Hair Wrap (Fiend Form Only)
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d4 + 6}) bludgeoning damage. If the target is Medium or smaller, it is {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 12}). Until this grapple ends, the target can't breathe, is {@condition blinded}, restrained, and the kubot can't use her Hair Wrap against other targets.

action.name: Claws (Fiend Form Only)
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. Hit: 11 ({@damage 2d4 + 6}) slashing damage.

action.name: Consume Energy (Fiend Form Only)
entries: The kubot draws energy from a creature it is grappling with. The target makes a {@dc 12} Constitution saving throw, taking 18 ({@damage 4d8}) necrotic damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. The kubot regains hit points equal to the amount of necrotic damage dealt. If a creature dies from this action, the kubot gains the age of the creature. The kubot's age can't go below 18 years old.

action.name: Dagger (Humanoid Form Only)
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d4 + 3}) piercing damage.

trait.name: Stone Camouflage
entries: The korred has advantage on Dexterity ({@skill Stealth}) checks made to hide in rocky terrain.

action.name: Greatclub
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}9 ({@damage 1d8 + 5}) bludgeoning damage, or 14 ({@damage 2d8 + 5}) bludgeoning damage if the korred is on the ground.

action.name: Rock
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 7} to hit, range 40/120 ft., one target. {@h}14 ({@damage 2d8 + 5}) bludgeoning damage, or 18 ({@damage 3d8 + 5}) bludgeoning damage if the korred is on the ground.

action.name: Command Hair
entries: The korred has at least one 30-foot-long rope woven out of its hair. As a bonus action, the korred commands one such rope within 30 feet of it to move up to 20 feet and entangle a Medium or smaller creature that the korred can see. The target must succeed on a {@dc 12} Dexterity saving throw or become {@condition grappled} by the rope (escape {@dc 12}). Until this grapple ends, the target is {@condition restrained}. The korred can use a bonus action to release the target, which is also freed if the korred dies or becomes {@condition incapacitated}.

A rope of korred hair has AC 15 and 15 hit points. It regains 1 hit point at the start of each of the korred's turns while it has at least 1 hit point and the korred is alive. If the rope drops to 0 hit points, it is destroyed.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
